description: Made from 45% recycled wool, this fashionable men’s fleece jacket is also eco-mindful. Plus, it’s comfortable, warm, and soft, so you won't want to take it off. With accents like faux leather zipper pulls, it will make you look good when you’re out on the town or just enjoying an evening by the fire.
name: Smartwool Hudson Trail Fleece Full Zip Jacket - Mens
